record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JULY 23, 2007, AT 10 A.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JULY 23, 2007, AT 10 A.M. -- (Senate - July 20, 2007)

[Page: S9668]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I believe there is no business now to come before the Senate. That being the case, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:03 p.m., adjourned until Monday, July 23, 2007, at 10 a.m.
